note.general: Manage your overall setup and preferences for Mac, such as software updates, device language, and more.
note.about: Simple macOS Sequoia 15.1.1 Clone with Next.js
note.description: This project is a personal learning exercise to explore and practice using Next.js. The goal is to create a simple clone of macOS Sequoia 15.1.1 to understand its UI and functionality better.
